Text.Page:
Panpi's making saberskin gloves, and he had to come wave them in my face.

He sniffed at my boots. Sniffed! Then he scrunched up his nose and said they make my feet smell!

Ooh, I just want to...I don't know what, but I have to strike back!"Well, yeah."

, you have to help me.

But what's better than saberskin? What?

Oh, I've got it! Have you seen the pauldrons those {@LinkCreature:15#6#disturbed constructs} wear? That's basilisk leather. Nothing could be better than that.

If you kill them, they won't be needing the leather, right?

Ah!

How soft. How supple! There's no way Panpi can top this!

Thank you!
You must bring me that leather! My pride depends on it!
